features: √【Two speed efficient cleaning mode】The electric bottle brush cleaner features two speed cleaning mode, employing high-speed automatic rotation (200-220 rpm) to propel soft silicone bristles for effective residue removal.

√【Multifunctional cleaning brush】: This electric baby bottle brush set contains electric bottle cleaner, bottle brush, nipple brush, straw cleaner brush, suitable for cleaning all kinds of baby bottles, water bottles, feeding bottles, pacifiers, straws, etc.

√【Safe and replaceable brush heads】:The baby bottle brush cleaner is made of high-quality food grade liquid silicone and ABS, which is safe and healthy,BPA-free. The brush heads are removable and replaceable, dishwasher safe and suitable for boiling, ensuring sterility for your baby's essentials and extending the life of the brush.

√【USB Rechargeable & Waterproof】 The electric baby bottle brush cleaner charges fast and has a long battery life, suitable for your daily cleaning of all the bottles and cups ! The electronic bottle brush cleaner is waterproof and can be cleaned in the shower.

√[Baby Registration Gift]: Introducing the next generation cleaning solution, WHNL electric baby bottle cleaner designed to simplify motherly duties and maximize your valuable time with your newborn. It's an exceptional baby shower gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent customer service
reviews.reviewText: I had purchased one and it randomly within a month of having it stopped working. The seller was quick to reach out to me and get a replacement sent out asap. Great product to use on bottles. Cuts down washing time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Love this brush
reviews.reviewText: I bought this brush after seeing it featured in an article on Facebook. I looked at the reviews and everyone seemed to like it so I used the gift card we got for our baby shower to buy it. I am so happy we got this brush, it makes washing our baby’s bottles so much easier. The different attachments are great for cleaning the Dr Brown’s bottles which have lots of parts. I highly recommend this brush. The only downside for me was the holder that attaches to the wall didn’t work, I don’t know if this is because our walls are textured or because the brush was too heavy for the adhesive to support it, but honestly that is a small flaw that doesn’t even matter to me.February 2024 updateWe have had this bottle brush for about 4 months and it has completely died. It says it’s charging but it won’t turn on anymore. I went to use it and it was dead then I plugged it in and let it charge overnight and it still wouldn’t turn on. I unplugged it and plugged it back in and the light turned red like it was charging but it still won’t turn on. I am so disappointed in this product because it only lasted 4 months before it died and I really liked it because it made me washing the bottles so easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SAVES SO MUCH TIME!
reviews.reviewText: This brush made my life so much easier! I hand-wash all the bottles and nipples and this brush makes it so much easier and faster. The brush is rechargeable via USB C port. This speaks of a quality because USB C is much better than outdated USB C mini port. I am surprised USB C mini is still showing up on new products, it’s totally outdated. Also, there is a silicone cover protecting the charging port from moisture. Anyways, you press the button and the brush starts spinning. That’s it! Battery life is pretty good, no stress about charging every or every other day, you can relax. Wand comes with 3 size brushes: small, medium, large.Small is AMAZING for narrow Dr. Brown’s nipples. Medium is awesome for wider nipples like Aventi. Large brush is for the bottles. All brushes are made out of silicone making it easy to sterilize. You can toss them in the washer or just in boiling water. I know it seems unnecessary but trust me, if you’re hand-washing the bottles this brush saves a lot of time.I do have a small tip: Disassemble all your bottles first and use small brush to wash all the nipples then use the large brush to wash all the bottles. This was you don’t need to switch attachments several times. Overall build is sturdy and feels durable. I am totally getting this for friends baby showers too, it’s a gem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Mostly useful - sometimes frustrating
reviews.reviewText: Overall, if you’re looking for an automatic bottle brush, this is a decent option. It’s really easy to use, made of silicone for easy sterilization and keeps a charge very well. My only complaint is that one of the attachments is almost impossible to get off once you get it on. The two larger options are easy to get on and off. But the smallest one specifically for cleaning nipples… is a pain. I have to use a butter knife to get under the bottom of it just to get it to pop off. So now I don’t even use it at all.It would be easier to get off if the silicone part was permanently attached to the plastic that snaps into to the motorized part, but you can pull the silicone right off, so there’s nothing much to grip in order to remove it.If your bottle nipples are wider than the Dr. Browns, you should be able to use the medium attachment just fine. If you use Dr Browns exclusively… be aware that you won’t be able to scrub the nipples very well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This easily cleans your baby bottles but also works amazing for cleaning cups or mugs. The price is amazing especially if you account for all the brushes you won't have to buy because you got this. The best part is the tip is silicone so you can easily wash it between uses and keep it nice and sanitary. This is easy to use just connect the appropriate tip and then push the button and clean the bottle with ease and just holding your hand on the button.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really liked this product while it lasted. I only used it for about 3-4 months before it stopped working. So very disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works great but didn’t last.
reviews.reviewText: This bottle brush was great the best thing I purchased. I bought this for my third baby because nothing is more daunting then washing bottles all the time but this brush made it much more bearable until one day 2 months after I started using it it just stopped spinning. It sounded like the motor was stripped or going out. Also when I was charging it the cord had to be sitting just at the right angle to charge, the port was extremely sensitive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love handy baby stuff
reviews.reviewText: Love this electric bottle cleaner! It does the job itself! Leaves the bottles very clean and barley no work
